definition: a forced draft (of wind, for smelting metal)/blast (in blast furnace)/bellows/to draw air using bellows
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
a blast furnace (in modern times)/a draft assisted furnace for smelting metals
hydraulic bellows/water-driven ventilation (for metal smelting furnace)

sentences.english: The function of the fire-blower of old times was similar to that of an air-blower now.
sentences.chinese: 以前吹火筒的功能就类似于现在的鼓风机。

sentences.english: Blasting gas stove with Two Head Stov.
The paper introduces the nickel smelting blast furnace control system.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了某镍冶炼厂鼓风炉控制系统。

sentences.english: After analyzing, there is the friction trace on the Teflon paster on the fan.
sentences.chinese: 经分析，鼓风机的特氟隆贴片上也有摩擦过的痕迹。

sentences.english: Proposals for development of the oxygen-enriched blast technique are made as well.
sentences.chinese: 还对发展富氧鼓风技术提出了建议。

sentences.english: The working fundamentals and effects of blower matched governor for mechanized shaft kiln are introduced, and the selection principles of blower are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了机立窑鼓风机调速装置的工作原理和工作效果。

sentences.english: The same powerful positive displacement blower technology used in large truck mounted vacuums is employed in the SAVE-YOUR-BACK-VAC.
sentences.chinese: 吸尘器上还使用了同样强大的正排量鼓风机技术。

sentences.english: The argon typically acts as a "shroud" gas to provide protection to the tuyere.
sentences.chinese: 氩主要作为覆盖气体对鼓风口提供保护。

sentences.english: We can extract iron from haematite by heating it with carbon in a blast furnace.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以把赤铁矿和碳在鼓风炉内一起加热来提取铁。

sentences.english: Some vacuums have blower features for drying wet horses.
sentences.chinese: 一些吸尘器配有专门用来吹干马的鼓风机。

sentences.english: These plants would then be burned in blast furnaces in order to eliminate the toxic elements.
sentences.chinese: 之后这些植物被投进鼓风炉来消除有毒元素。

sentences.english: The finite element modal analysis of fan axis is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对某鼓风机轴有限元模型进行了模态分析。

sentences.english: Roots blowers are important manufacturing equipments widely used in industrial field.
sentences.chinese: 罗茨鼓风机是在工业领域应用十分广泛的重要设备。

sentences.english: The A/C unit controls the air temperature and the blower drives the airflow.
sentences.chinese: 暖风机控制空气温度，鼓风机用来驱动气流。

sentences.english: The furnace dehumidified blast technology develops with the blowing technique.
sentences.chinese: 高炉脱湿鼓风技术随着喷吹技术的发展而迅速发展。

sentences.english: Coke is used predominantly as a fuel reluctant in the blast furnace.
sentences.chinese: 焦炭最初是在鼓风炉里作为助燃剂使用。

definition: a blast furnace (in modern times)/a draft assisted furnace for smelting metals
